member.name: Size.Empty
member.summary: The Size.Empty method determines whether aSize object is empty.
member.returns: If theWidth andHeight data members are both equal to zero, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: Size.Equals
member.summary: The Size.Equals method determines whether twoSize objects are equal.
member.param: Reference to aSize object that is compared to thisSize object.
member.returns: If theWidth andHeight data members of the twoSize objects are equal, this method returns TRUE; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: Size.Size
member.summary: Creates a Size object and initializes its members by copying the members of another Size object.
member.param: Reference to a Size object that is used to initialize this Size object.

member.name: Size.Size
member.summary: Creates a Size object and initializes itsWidth andHeight data members.
member.param: Integer that specifies the initial value of theWidth data member.
Integer that specifies the initial value of theHeight data member.

member.name: Size.Size
member.summary: Creates a new Size object and initializes the members to zero. This is the default constructor.
